author: Justin Klawans
title: Muriel Bowser Warns D.C. to Brace for Trucker Convoy Chaos
description: The preparations came as the Pentagon is expected to deploy National Guard troops to Washington, D.C.
content:
Washington, D.C., Mayor Muriel Bowser is preparing for a wave of protesting truckers to descend on the nation's capital to demonstrate against COVID-19 vaccine mandates.
